content: Absolutely, small details can play a crucial role in storytelling, and they can make a big difference in how the story is perceived by the audience. In The Box, the button is the catalyst for the story's conflict, and it drives the characters' decisions and actions. It is a great example of how a seemingly small detail can have a significant impact on a story's outcome. Overall, paying attention to small details and using them effectively can make a story more engaging and impactful for the audience.
